dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr'),'MM/DD/YYYY') s_date, :START_DATE start_dt, :END_DATE end_dt, :LOC loc_string FROM DUAL

SELECT DISTINCT j.job_xid job_id, j.attribute4 loc_num, con1.contact_xid bill_to, (CASE WHEN js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' THEN TO_CHAR(js.update_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(j.attribute_date1,'MM/DD/YYYY') END) close_date, (CASE WHEN js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END) is_cancelled, NVL(TO_CHAR(brt.r_version), '0') booking_count, TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(rlp.file_name) FROM reportowner.report_log rl INNER JOIN reportowner.report_log_parameter rlp ON rl.file_name = rlp.file_name AND rlp.parameter_name = 'JOB_ID' WHERE rlp.parameter_value = j.job_gid)) document_count, TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1)) container_count, TO_CHAR(((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT v1.voucher_gid) FROM job_order_release_join jorj1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul1 ON jorj1.order_release_gid = ssul1.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj1 ON ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj1.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej1 ON sessuj1.s_equipment_gid = ssej1.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s1 ON ssej1.shipment_gid = s1.shipment_gid INNER JOIN invoice_shipment ish1 ON s1.shipment_gid = ish1.shipment_gid INNER JOIN voucher v1 ON ish1.invoice_gid = v1.invoice_gid WHERE jorj1.job_gid = j.job_gid ) + (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT inv2.invoice_gid) FROM job_order_release_join jorj2 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul2 ON jorj2.order_release_gid = ssul2.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj2 ON ssul2.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj2.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej2 ON sessuj2.s_equipment_gid = ssej2.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s2 ON ssej2.shipment_gid = s2.shipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment_bill sbill2 ON s.shipment_gid = sbill2.shipment_gid INNER JOIN invoice inv2 ON sbill2.bill_gid = inv2.invoice_gid WHERE jorj2.job_gid = j.job_gid))) finance_count, (CASE WHEN sref.shipment_refnum_value = 'YES' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END) letter_of_credit, TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT gtc.gtm_transaction_gid) FROM job_order_release_join jorj3 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul3 ON jorj3.order_release_gid = ssul3.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj3 ON ssul3.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj3.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej3 ON sessuj3.s_equipment_gid = ssej3.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s3 ON ssej3.shipment_gid = s3.shipment_gid INNER JOIN gtm_transaction gt ON gt.object_id = s.shipment_gid AND gt.data_query_type_gid ='SHIPMENT' AND gt.gtm_transaction_type ='TRANSACTION' INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_line gtl ON gt.gtm_transaction_gid = gtl.gtm_transaction_gid INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_line gtcl ON gtl.gtm_transaction_line_gid = gtcl.preceding_transaction_line_gid AND gtcl.gtm_transaction_gid != 'SCOULAR.AES_VESSEL' INNER JOIN gtm_transaction gtc ON gtcl.gtm_transaction_gid = gtc.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtc.gtm_consol_criteria_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.AES' WHERE jorj3.job_gid = j.job_gid)) aes, (CASE WHEN loc1.country_code3_gid = 'JPN' OR loc2.country_code3_gid = 'JPN' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END) japan_two_four, (SELECT LISTAGG(con2.contact_xid,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY con2.contact_xid) FROM shipment_involved_party sip2 INNER JOIN contact con2 ON sip2.involved_party_contact_gid = con2.contact_gid WHERE sip2.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER') ops_manager FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid ='TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid='VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary='Y' AND s.perspective='B' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN glogowner.xxscou_booking_revision_tbl brt ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = brt.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TRANSHIP PORT' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON 'SCOULAR.' || cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job_status js ON j.job_gid = js.job_gid AND js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' LEFT OUTER JOIN job_status js2 ON j.job_gid = js2.job_gid AND js2.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB OPEN' AND js2.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB OPEN_CLOSED' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.LETTER OF CREDIT' WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND (TO_DATE(j.attribute_date1,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(j.attribute_date1,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:LOC IS NULL OR (NOT :LOC IS NULL AND j.attribute4 IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt4.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt4))) ORDER BY j.job_xid
